column1: @bobwatson_va01 Thank you for all that you do Bob
Thank you #VA01 https://t.co/pJpDPAyeWF
It is a true honor to be entrusted with representing you in Congress for two more years and I cannot thank all of you enough for the continued support! #VA01
We laughed and reminisced about previous election years while ribbing each other as families often do. Surrounded by my wonderful staff we watched the results come in together.

Behind the scenes: These are the moments that mean the most. The results of this election would mean nothing without my family and fellow First District elected officials and friends. While drafting my remarks to share with all of you tonight I was on a Zoom call with my family. https://t.co/HAM1wGuIIG
@BradOnMessage Thank you @BradOnMessage !
We are two hours away from polls closing in Virginia! Have you gotten to the polls yet today? https://t.co/kWf4ZYGfaJ
It was a wonderful morning at local precincts in King George! It is so encouraging to see so many people coming out on such a beautiful day to exercise their right to vote. https://t.co/4BL1CferOk
@BrianSchoeneman Thank you @BrianSchoeneman
@rsaydlowski Thank you for your support!
@swavymom Thank you for your support!

As Ranking Member of House Armed Services Committee’s Subcommittee on Seapower + Projection Forces a senior member of Natural Resources Committee + a Co-Chair of  Rural Broadband Caucus we are well poised to take on Virginia’s challenges.  Can I count on your vote today? https://t.co/IbyGTFAWBR

Have you already mailed out your absentee ballot and want to check the status? Did you know you can track your absentee ballot? Go to https://t.co/MyEuSfMHLn to find out how and to find Virginia specific voting information! https://t.co/6i2I7ID7Il

#ICYMI: My re-election campaign has been endorsed by 39 elected officials across the First District including the endorsement of 17 sheriffs. Thank you for your continued support! Click the link below to view the entire list. https://t.co/2OClTo85Ok

🚨 Return Your Absentee Ballot 🚨  Absentee Ballots must be postmarked by Tuesday November 3rd! Check your ballots carefully review instructions to complete + return to your local registrar by 7PM on Election Day.   Look up your registrar here: https://t.co/Zr7UZGf29e https://t.co/NVNYDEdmrD

🚨 Important Voting Information 🚨  Today is the last day to vote early in person! This year you may vote in-person on election day early at your local registrar’s office OR if you requested an absentee ballot you may complete it + drop it off. https://t.co/DF2ovdkzoo
🚨 Urgent Deadline 🚨 Tomorrow is the last day to vote early in-person! Every vote counts! https://t.co/HojrgrncpO
Thank you @ACUConservative for your endorsement of my re-election campaign! https://t.co/BCTB7Lhobl
I stand with our Law Enforcement Officers! Like if you do too. https://t.co/RWofwv2PVf

I wish to extend my heartfelt congratulations to Supreme Court Justice Amy Coney Barrett on her confirmation today. She will serve our nation and her post with integrity and discipline. https://t.co/RLSaSamZ2b

🚨 Return Absentee Ballot 🚨 The deadline for returning Absentee Ballots is close: they must be postmarked by Tues Nov 3rd!  Carefully review the instructions to complete + return ballot to local registrar by 7pm on Election Day Find your registrar here: https://t.co/Zr7UZGf29e https://t.co/kkG1R57MHk

“Wittman has worked closely with local governments regarding the lack of broadband in many rural areas in the Commonwealth and across the nation.”   The article below from the Richmond Times-Dispatch breaks down what I’ve been working on in Congress.   https://t.co/hiCbo55mpK

🚨 Important Voting Information 🚨 The deadline to request an absentee ballot to be mailed to you is TODAY! Your request must be received by your Registrar by 5:00 p.m. For more voting information visit my website here: https://t.co/3sJgkUOsEk https://t.co/9QWGFRYBo3

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨  Henry District Supervisor of Hanover County Sean Davis has endorsed my re-election. Thank you Sean!   "I am pleased to endorse Congressman Rob Wittman.  Rob's dedication and commitment to his constituents serves as an example of true public service." https://t.co/DBoQ7SWvAk
“I am proud to vote for Rob this year because he is an ardent supporter of our military and our Constitution.”  Thank you for your support Hannah! https://t.co/nyLDySwuyD

Make a plan to Vote! This year you may #vote in-person on election day early at your local registrar’s office OR if you requested an absentee ballot you may complete it + drop it off at any drop-off location in your county or city.  Learn more here: https://t.co/3sJgkUOsEk https://t.co/Sgd5eoqaVX

that saved a life last year. It was a pleasure to spend the day with such passionate men and women and I am proud to have them as one of our many successful First District businesses.    Thank you to everyone who made it possible!

their process as well as hear about upcoming projects like their line of women’s tactical gear for the U.S. Military.    We then went out to the firing range in Stafford where Sheriff Decatur arranged for us to test some of their gear including their bullet resistant suit jacket

Yesterday I was invited to meet with the team behind @Aspettoinc. Based out of Fredericksburg Aspetto is America’s first bullet resistant clothing line. We toured their Fredericksburg location where I was able to learn the story behind the clothing and get an inside look at https://t.co/8RjRDA9x0h

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨 Thank you King George Supervisor Annie Cupka for your support! “Rob Wittman has always done what is needed to find the right solutions for the First District. He is responsive to and considerate of all no matter political or religious ideologies.” https://t.co/xz9g7ehCR1

🚨 Endorsement alert 🚨 Thank you Supervisor Cindy Shelton for endorsement my re-election!  “It is an honor to endorse Congressman Wittman on behalf of myself and ALL of my constituents. He has truly set the bar for leadership and integrity.” https://t.co/vdr0LYTfhS

Thank you Supervisor Lockwood for your lovely words on my work on broadband.  “I want to thank Congressman Wittman for his tireless dedication and commitment to bringing broadband to rural areas. He and his amazing staff are always willing to assist and answer questions.” https://t.co/wMrPrtWNt1

Thank you Laquan for your support!  “We need to ensure our voice is heard in Virginia now more than ever. There could not be two more opposite candidates and it is important to vote for the one who represents our communities and will fight for us best.” https://t.co/f9SNopFOgN

Thank you to the National Federation of Independent Business for the Guardian of SmalI Business Award. It's a privilege to remain focused on supporting policies that create jobs spur growth + put more money in the pockets of hard-working Virginians.  https://t.co/aWrFhMaQ86

🚨 Endorsement Alert 🚨 Prince William County Sheriff Glen Hill has endorsed my re-election. “Rob Wittman has spent his career standing by law enforcement and our First District communities. It is this history of partnership and accountability that makes me proud to endorse him.” https://t.co/dUdiw50UTT

🚨 Endorsement Alert 🚨  Thank you Mechanichsville Supervisor W. Canova Peterson for your endorsement of my re-election.   “Rob understands all parts of his district and works every day to better the lives of his constituents. I will proudly cast my vote for Rob on November 3rd.” https://t.co/KDyL20nScW

🚨 Endorsement alert 🚨  Essex County Sheriff Arnie Holmes has endorsed my re-election campaign. Thank you!   “I Sheriff W A ‘Arnie’ Holmes give you my full endorsement for re-election for Congress. Good luck and I am looking forward to working with you in the years to come.” https://t.co/Yj2LbPdXQW

🚨 Endorsement Alert 🚨  Thank you Cold Harbor Supervisor Michael Herzberg for your endorsement of my re-election!  “I admire Rob's dedication and devotion to the people. He is a proven leader who remains actively engaged working to strengthen communities and to keep us safe.” https://t.co/6GtSkNhO2E

🚨 IMPORTANT VOTING INFORMATION 🚨  Today is the last day to Register to Vote for this election! Every vote counts!  Make sure you register here: https://t.co/Mh124PtcDG #election2020 #vote https://t.co/oa940g294r

Since 1972 October 13 has been recognized as the birthday of the @USNavy   I am honored to work to ensure that our service men + women have what's needed to do one of the bravest most selfless jobs.  Today we recognize the Navy + its Veterans for all they have given to America. https://t.co/rD42ZEWvxj

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨   Stonehouse Supervisor Sue Sadler has endorsed my re-election. Thank you for your support of my re-election Sue!  “Rep. Wittman is on the front lines working for and serving the American people.” https://t.co/xFgbNoNm6j
#TeamWittman’s Saturdays have been well-spent so far out and about in the district hearing what is most important to you! https://t.co/h7NsgRtRur

Thank you Chief Stephen Adkins of the Chickahominy Tribe for these kind words of support!   “Congressman Wittman has long been a stalwart supporter of the indigienous tribes within the Commonwealth of Virginia and beyond. His walk matches his talk.” https://t.co/Nh9l3Bqet2

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨   Sheriff Bob Mosier of Fauquier County Sheriff’s Office has endorsed my re-election campaign. Thank you Sheriff!   “Rob has a proven track-record in support of our men and women in law enforcement. A vote for Rob Wittman is a vote ensuring law and order.” https://t.co/aVFZZC29gx

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨 Thank you Supervisor Lockwood for your endorsement!  “All I can say is that I hope the rest of the counties in Virginia have a Congressman as dedicated and accessible as Rob Wittman.” https://t.co/y0GEhtcRA1

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨  Thank you @MarkColeVA your endorsement!  “There are few men who hold themselves to as high of a standard of integrity and service as Rob Wittman and his record of working towards bipartisan legislation that benefits everyone makes him the only choice.” https://t.co/vAqEUWKvS2

Have you seen this latest LTE?   “By falsely claiming he is being attacked for his faith Qasim Rashid is trying to distract us from the fact that he actually wrote the things Rep. Rob Wittman highlights in his ad." -  Brian Brown King George https://t.co/E62VS3PUDY

I commute from Montross every day to stay grounded in reality + focused on major issues Virginians care about. We need less government intervention not more. & that’s exactly what I hear from my district. Together we can secure a better + more prosperous future for all Virginia https://t.co/2fwHukeXEz

“I want to thank you (Rob) for continuing your fight to take broadband to the best level possible.”   Thank you Carolyn for your support of my work on broadband! It has always been and will continue to be a priority for me. #VA01 https://t.co/uhnB3zAFbO

Thank you @DJJordanVA for your support!    “My support for Rob Wittman comes from years of watching him fight for our interests as Virginians...He is there for the people and is open to diverse ideas and respectful dialogue...I will happily be voting for Rob this November.” https://t.co/zcs9GUR1DF

🚨 IMPORTANT VOTING INFORMATION 🚨  For this year’s election you may vote in-person on election day early at your local registrar’s office OR if you requested an absentee ballot you may complete it and drop it off at any drop-off location in your county or city. https://t.co/wmAmvUXig3

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨  Virginia State Senator Ryan McDougle has endorsed my re-election campaign. Thank you for your support Ryan!   “Rob is committed to representing his constituents through actions not just words." https://t.co/X6kTAoiOaT

Cindy Shelton - Stafford County Board of Supervisors - has voiced her support of my efforts to expand broadband in the First District. Thank you Cindy!   “Congressman Wittman has been committed to expanding high-speed broadband throughout the First District.” https://t.co/Tj2dvfZV04

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨  Sheriff Tony Lippa of the Caroline County Sheriff’s Office has endorsed my campaign during this election cycle! I pride myself on being a friend to both law enforcement + our local communities + am honored to have so many leaders supporting me. https://t.co/hLTDThgd0L
https://t.co/gT6worS8gQ
https://t.co/dmmef7uGyc

Maj. Gen. Phillips thank you for your support + your service! "The decision to support a specific candidate really boils down to who best can support both your interests and the overall needs of the 1st District. Congressman Wittman is absolutely the right choice for #VA01."

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨   Virginia State Senator Siobhan Dunnavant has endorsed my re-election campaign! I am proud of my record of working with local state and federal leaders to find solutions that protect the interests of #VA01. Thank you Senator! https://t.co/h9n7NsHToQ

Thank you Annie Cupka - King George Board of Supervisors - for your support of my work on broadband!  “Congressman Wittman has been a committed partner in ensuring families and businesses have access to distance-learning platforms telemedicine and online job applications.” https://t.co/7If7HIwI3I

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨  I am pleased to announce that Coles District Supervisor Yesli Vega has endorsed my re-election. Thank you for your support Yesli!  "The choice is clear. For economic prosperity and the American Dream re-elect Congressman Rob Wittman.” https://t.co/EL11j28z4q

Serving and working on behalf of the First District is a job that I take very seriously and it’s an honor to represent you in Congress! I would be honored to have your vote on Tuesday November 3. Thank you for your support! https://t.co/u2aV5jmONJ

I am pleased to announce that Brentsville District Supervisor @JeanineLawsonPW has endorsed my re-election. Thank you for your support Jeanine!   “In the First District we are a people of family values and patriotism and no one represents this better than Rob Wittman.” https://t.co/uIADyuPwTG

As you can imagine in Washington there is a lot of talking going on but not a lot of listening. I work very hard to listen to people on both sides of the aisle and because of that I’ve been able to get things done. Read about my work here: https://rob https://t.co/0iqHxbw34D https://t.co/MQ1jmQYFmm

Honored to have the support of @TimParrishVA Chairman of @PWCGOP + Marine Corps veteran! “He believes in safe neighborhoods and safe communities. He supports our law enforcement and our military. Most importantly he supports you the voter and the members of Virginia’s First.” https://t.co/x3FXPfLyah

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨 Thank you Senator @ReevesVA for your support!  “Rob has spent his career in Congress working tirelessly for our communities... With such a clear choice in front of us I stand with Rob Wittman this election cycle.” https://t.co/9x5wJOYivr

We need a military that not only projects power around the globe but is fully prepared to take on the challenges we ask of them in order to keep our nation secure. Not only is a strong national defense important to keep our nation safe it is also important for the economy of VA.

The Constitution states providing for the common defense is Congress’s first responsibility & for sixty years members of both parties have come together to pass the National Defense Authorization Act; that’s because national defense is a must pass and must fund priority.

As the Republican Leader of the Seapower and Projection Forces Subcommittee I have the privilege of fighting to give back to our men and women in uniform every day.  I refuse to deprive our men and women in uniform of the resources they need to be successful in their missions. https://t.co/UyWuIYFOOJ

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨  Sheriff Chris Giles of King George County endorsed my re-election campaign. I pride myself on working together with community leaders + elected officials to find practical + long lasting solutions to the problems we face + am honored to have his support. https://t.co/mY0b2jARdD

Thank you Jane for the support and amazing words from Spotsylvania! #VA01   “He (Rob) understands that the future is vast and diverse and is looking to make sure each student knows there is an education path that will work for them.”   https://t.co/WnMqlb1FzK

#TeamWittman had another great weekend out in the District! It was a pleasure to meet with all of you + hand out lawn signs. We are about to enter the final month so keep your eyes peeled for more events this month. My team and I can’t wait to see all of you on the road! #VA01 https://t.co/2GUc3EqnNI

We must rebuild our military and that starts here in Virginia. And that means tens of thousands of jobs for Virginians in the First District. Read about my work here: https://t.co/pOj5PU8oXn https://t.co/V5NtDLGVoA

ENDORSEMENT ALERT   Sheriff John Charboneau of King and Queen County has endorsed my re-election campaign. Thank you Sheriff!  “He understands what both law enforcement and the community needs and I cannot think of a better fit for our Representative in Congress.” https://t.co/v7MZXjm4NZ

Don’t forget to request your ballot if you are planning to #voteabsentee in this year’s election. Click the link below to be taken to Virginia’s Department of Elections where forms and official instructions can be found. #VA01 https://t.co/19Sw164Pik https://t.co/VCqmqcBq61

I would like to extend my congratulations to Justice Amy Coney Barrett on her nomination to the Supreme Court. She will hold her position with integrity and faithfully uphold the Constitution. https://t.co/3upiMmtMSe

My team and I can't wait to spend time with you all tomorrow at our Lawn Sign Distribution parties for Prince William and Spotsylvania. Be sure to come out and say hello! #VA01 #TeamWittman https://t.co/Tc8lXidOLN

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨 Delegate Scott Wyatt of Virginia’s 97 District has endorsed my re-election. Thank you for the support! “I am proud to endorse Rob Wittman in his reelection to Congress. His pro growth approach to the economy is critical to the future of American jobs.” https://t.co/Bhmp1hZhdO
Join Team Wittman Today!  https://t.co/mt49eRAcnP https://t.co/wDPNdkokjX

On September 28 from 4:00 - 5:00 pm @rappahannock_cc will be hosting a virtual meet + greet. You will be able to ask questions + hear me speak on issues that matter most to #VA01 + this upcoming election. Pre-registration is required + can be done here: https://t.co/Vu9wGzt4qV

Last weekend’s events were incredibly successful + we don’t want this momentum to stop! If you support Team Wittman + are looking for ways to get involved visit https://t.co/OwCTGXKtLs! We are in the final stretch. Let’s finish strong #VA01   Join #TeamWittman TODAY! https://t.co/YGu4SVi221

🚨ENDORSEMENT ALERT🚨 It's an honor to have Rock Hill Supervisor @VoteVanuch's endorsement “During the beginning of the COVID-19 pandemic I reached out to Rob because locally we were having testing issues. Rob immediately reached out to the VP’s office and had solutions for us!“ https://t.co/3fWp7Z73Q6

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨 Delegate @MargaretRansone has endorsed my re-election. “He(Rob) understands our family concerns... Now more than ever I appreciate that he is down to earth accessible continues to support rural jobs and has not become a politician in Washington.” https://t.co/VnbT5FUThH

Let's set the record straight. I have NEVER called Qasim Rashid an Islamic terrorist. What I have done is work to expose his far left ideas to the residents of the first district. https://t.co/lc9EkNpKIC
And @QasimRashid does believe in federal funding for abortions. Let's keep him accountable. https://t.co/ISby7ZE5m9
Don't let @QasimRashid fool you. He did indeed say that Capitalism is not the answer. https://t.co/CCU5soG50L
You can watch tonight's second and final debate on YouTube or on my FB by clicking the link below: https://t.co/lYIhQjbCor
@dmactw Hello @dmactw Tonight's debate can be viewed live on YouTube at this link: https://t.co/jM1jD4uNYP

#TeamWittman had an amazing time yesterday with you all at our lawn sign distribution parties. It was my pleasure to be able to discuss the issues that you all find most important in the upcoming election. Thank you to everyone who helped make these events a success! #VA01 https://t.co/p1hFd5Gbsd

🚨 ENDORSEMENT ALERT 🚨 It is an honor to have Sheriff David R. Hines of the Hanover County Sheriff’s Office endorse my run for re-election. I am proud to be known as a friend to law enforcement and an advocate for keeping our communities the safest they can be. https://t.co/MDvWMzdEbn

My family and I wish to extend our heartfelt condolences to the family and friends of Ruth Bader Ginsburg. She was a highly respected woman and Supreme Court Justice who held her title and post with integrity and pride. She served her country well and will be greatly missed.
Happy Rosh Hashanah to our Jewish brothers and sisters. May this new year bring you joy and peace. https://t.co/MyrfZgEyFs
Today we celebrate the Air Force and those who have worn the uniform but every day we celebrate all who serve and have served.

Today's the 73rd b-day of @usairforce. We are the land of the free because of the bravery these Americans exemplify through their service. It's sacrifices made by Americans like #VA01 natives Rich + Ruth Anderson that we're able to enjoy the freedoms protected by our Constitution https://t.co/bw0r2ounzg
We will be hosting distribution parties all throughout the district in the coming weeks. #VA01 https://t.co/3npN2SXo5t
Come out this Saturday to get a lawn sign of your own and help my team and I distribute them! https://t.co/VSoLByKfuC
https://t.co/ExiAJc2QkS

Are you looking for ways to get involved with #TeamWittman? We would not be where we are today without the amazing support of our #VA01 volunteers. There are multiple ways you can help out this election cycle. Go to https://t.co/kup5ua37Nn to choose the one that best fits you! https://t.co/ILUjXK2Ik0
https://t.co/dCaobXa1Xk

#TeamWittman is all over the district like Christian Leap who was knocking in Ferry Farm this week. Have you seen a team member? If so be sure to stop + say hello! 👋 We would be happy to add you to the family! #VA01 https://t.co/kup5ua37Nn https://t.co/yr31PvZc3S
#TeamWittman had a little help putting up lawn sign in Colonial Beach yesterday. Want a sign for your yard? Go to https://t.co/kup5ua37Nn to request one! #VA01 https://t.co/73Ur57xsRF
It is an honor to serve the District that I have called home for so many years. #VA01 #TeamWittman https://t.co/sp05tiweCb
Here we are in Hanover! #TeamWittman is out again today in #VA01. Find out how you can get involved at https://t.co/kup5ua37Nn https://t.co/OgeFpr2Wux
